txt.en: Minda is on a hill near her broken waggon, in the eastern Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Minda Heathertoes.
'You did it! You found my supplies and defeated the waggon snatcher! Oh dear, but where is poor Stomper?'
'Poor Stomper! Please, find him and my waggon!'

'Hello, friend! My name is Minda Heathertoes, and I am having a grand adventure! Well, to be truthful, it has been rather more terrifying than grand. Blasted waggon snatchers made off with my pony and my waggon full of supplies! Thankfully, these good folk found me wandering on the road and brought me here. Grateful though I am, the League of the Axe hasn't any time to go chasing after a silly hobbit’s supplies. If… if you could help me with this task, I could make it worth your while!\n\n'The brigands went up into the Wildwood with Stomper and my supply waggon. You shoulda seen how Stomper fought them! He wasn’t going without a fight, and my supplies went flying everywhere! I bet if you follow the trail of bags that were tossed, it would lead you straight to Stomper! If you happen upon any of those brigands or their leader on the way, I encourage you to deal with them swiftly!'
A young hobbit finds herself in (even farther than usual) over her head when her waggon is attacked and her goods are stolen by brigands in the Wildwood.
The brigands and their leader took off up the road east of Trader's Wharf in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should follow the trail of stolen supplies and deal with any brigands along the way.
